name: Running Water a.k.a Jugsy
description:
This game was made for the Itchio WeeklyGameJam.

Jugsy is a jug of water running away from his problems. Stability is key.

I am aware of the flickering, but game jam. *shrug*

Space - Jump

Left/Right A/D - Move Left, Move Right

'R' - Resets Jugsy at any time
